Yeah that would be fun for Riot. Heyyyyy, by the way Nintendo, I just need to steal one of the most iconic enemies from your game. Oh why you ask? For the ult of a champion. That would be a fun conversation!

And Final-boss Veigar doesn't have a power-glove, Arcade MF NES Zappers, and Arcade Hecarim isn't directly taken from Robot Unicorn Attack. 

Pretty sure these are considered "tributes", and honestly her  Mega-death-rocket is already a bullet-bill... it's just pink.
